org.mini2Dx.core.geom

Class LineSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.LineSegment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Line

    public class LineSegment
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a segement of a line (the space between two points )

        public boolean contains(float x,
               float y)
        Returns if the coordinate x,y is on the line between point A and point B
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate
        y - The y coordinate
        Returns:
        False if the coordinate is not on the line between point A and point B

      • getIntersection

        public Point getIntersection(LineSegment lineSegment)
        Returns the point at which this LineSegment intersects with another
        Parameters:
        lineSegment - The LineSegment to check for intersection with
        Returns:
        Null if the LineSegments don't intersect

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Rectangle rectangle)
        Returns if a Rectangle intersects this LineSegment
        Parameters:
        rectangle - The Rectangle to test for intersection
        Returns:
        False if this LineSegment does not intersect the Rectangle
